entry.title: AgencyPMG/ProgrammingChallenges
entry.summary:
Programming challenges for interviewees.

PMG Programming Challenges

A few small programming challenges that let us see how job candidates work.

What Languages Can I Use?

Just about anything you like, but we work mostly with...

  • PHP
  • JavaScript (node & in browser)
  • Python
  • Go

How do I ask questions?

Open an issue.

How long should I spend on this?

Take your time and do your best work. The code you produce here should be a very good indicator of how you would code in a production environment. If you find a problem is taking a long time, let us know! Chances are it's probably too big for this set of challenges.

Can I use third-party libraries?

Sure! We're interested in seeing how you work, treat this challenge like any other project.

How do I submit my answer?

Follow the instructions you recieved for how to submit.
